overview: Specify the base Artifactory URL containing the Black Duck Detect Air-gap zip.
Choose the version of Black Duck Detect you would like to use.
Provide the URL that lets you access your Hub server. For example "https://hub.example.com/&quot
Choose the Username and Password from the list to authenticate to the Black Duck server.
Alternatively, choose the Api Token from the list to authenticate to the Black Duck server.
If the credentials you are looking for are not in the list then you can add them with the Add button.
Select 'Trust Hub SSL Certificates' if you want to trust the Hub server certificates.
